tool_description: Verifies business registration status and retrieves official business information from corporate registries.

jurisdiction.description: State or jurisdiction where business is registered

business_type.description: Type of business entity (corporation, llc, partnership, sole_proprietorship)

error_messages: Business not found: No matching business found in the specified jurisdiction
Invalid jurisdiction: Provide a valid state or jurisdiction code
Registration number mismatch: Registration number does not match business name
Inactive business status: Business registration is inactive or dissolved
Invalid business type: Use one of [corporation, llc, partnership, sole_proprietorship]
usage: Enter business name and jurisdiction, optionally provide registration number and business type. Returns official business registration details and current status.
